string.text: Very Heavy
Dust Storm (Special)
Rain/Snow Density
Fog Density
Chance of Rain
Chance of Fog
Chance of Dust Storms
Chance of rain in forests. Default is 20%.
Chance of fog in forests. Default is 10%.
Chance of dust storms in forests. Default is 0%.
Chance of rain in steppes. Default is 5%.
Chance of fog in steppes. Default is 5%.
Chance of dust storms in steppes. Default is 0%.
Chance of rain in deserts. Default is 1%.
Chance of fog in deserts. Default is 0%.
Chance of dust storms in deserts. Default is 10%.
Chance of rain near rivers. Default is 10%.
Chance of fog near rivers. Default is 20%.
Chance of dust storms near rivers. Default is 0%.
Chance of rain in other terrain. Default is 10%.
Chance of fog in other terrain. Default is 10%.
Chance of dust storms in other terrain. Default is 0%.
Dust Storms
Arena can have rain. Disabled by default.
Arena can have fog. Disabled by default.
Arena can have dust storms. Disabled by default.
Override Rain Density
Toggle Override Rain Density
Override rain density. Disabled by default.
Overridden rain density. Default is 0.00.
Override Fog Density
Toggle Override Fog Density
Override fog density. Disabled by default.
Overridden fog density. Default is 1.
Rain Effect on Movement Speed
Multiplier for rain effect on movement speed. Default is 1.0.
Rain Effect on Weapon Inaccuracy
Multiplier for rain effect on ranged weapon inaccuracy. Default is 1.0.
Rain Effect on Shooter Error
Multiplier for rain effect on AI shooter error. Default is 1.0.
Rain Effect on Morale
Multiplier for rain effect on morale. Default is 1.0.
Rain Effect on Posture
Multiplier for rain effect on RBM posture. Default is 1.0.
Fog Effect on Shooter Error
Multiplier for fog effect on AI shooter error. Default is 1.0.
Fog Effect on Morale
Multiplier for fog effect on morale. Default is 1.0.
Dust Effect on Movement Speed
Multiplier for dust effect on movement speed. Default is 1.0.
Dust Effect on Weapon Inaccuracy
Multiplier for dust effect on ranged weapon inaccuracy. Default is 1.0.
Dust Effect on Shooter Error
Multiplier for dust effect on AI shooter error. Default is 1.0.
Dust Effect on Morale
Multiplier for dust effect on morale. Default is 1.0.
Dust Effect on Posture
Multiplier for dust effect on RBM posture. Default is 1.0.
Hide in Free Camera Mode
Hide rain, snow and dust storms in RTS Camera's free camera mode. Weather effects will still apply. Disabled by default.
